name: Bitsadmin Download from Suspicious Domain
description: Detects usage of bitsadmin downloading a file from a suspicious domain
false_positives: Some legitimate apps use this, but limited.
query: (process.executable:/.*\\[Bb][Ii][Tt][Ss][Aa][Dd][Mm][Ii][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:(/.*\ \/[Tt][Rr][Aa][Nn][Ss][Ff][Ee][Rr]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Cc][Rr][Ee][Aa][Tt][Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Aa][Dd][Dd][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\ .*/) AND process.command_line:(/.*[Rr][Aa][Ww]\.[Gg][Ii][Tt][Hh][Uu][Bb][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Gg][Ii][Ss][Tt]\.[Gg][Ii][Tt][Hh][Uu][Bb][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Pp][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Cc][Dd][Nn]\.[Dd][Ii][Ss][Cc][Oo][Rr][Dd][Aa][Pp][Pp]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]\/[Aa][Tt][Tt][Aa][Cc][Hh][Mm][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ss]\/.*/ OR /.*[Mm][Ee][Dd][Ii][Aa][Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Mm][Ee][Gg][Aa]\.[Nn][Zz].*/ OR /.*[Dd][Dd][Nn][Ss]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt].*/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee]\.[Ee][Ee].*/ OR /.*\.[Hh][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*\.[Gg][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo]\/.*/ OR /.*[Uu][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee]\.[Ii][Oo].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Tt][Oo][Rr][Aa][Gg][Ee]\.[Gg][Oo][Oo][Gg][Ll][Ee][Aa][Pp][Ii][Ss]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Aa][Nn][Oo][Nn][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Ee][Nn][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Ii][Tt]\.[Ii][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Rr][Aa][Nn][Ss][Ff][Ee][Rr]\.[Ss][Hh].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\bitsadmin.exe AND process.command_line:(*\ \/transfer\ * OR *\ \/create\ * OR *\ \/addfile\ *) AND process.command_line:(*raw.githubusercontent.com* OR *gist.githubusercontent.com* OR *pastebin.com* OR *cdn.discordapp.com\/attachments\/* OR *mediafire.com* OR *mega.nz* OR *ddns.net* OR *.paste.ee* OR *.hastebin.com* OR *.ghostbin.co\/* OR *ufile.io* OR *storage.googleapis.com* OR *anonfiles.com* OR *send.exploit.in* OR *transfer.sh*))`
